name: sessionbuddy
description: Chrome extension for managing cookie stores

scripts.build: npm run clean && vite build && npm run post-build
scripts.post-build: cp manifest.json background.js content-script.js session-buddy.html main.html redirect.js set-background-color.js settings.js settings.html dist/ && cp -r assets dist/ && cp src/popup.html dist/ && sed -i '' 's|src="./popup.ts"|src="/assets/index.5ee68d82.js"|' dist/popup.html && sed -i '' 's|href="./assets/tailwind.css"|href="/assets/index.7d23c72d.css"|' dist/popup.html && mkdir -p dist/_locales/en && cp _locales/en/messages.json dist/_locales/en/
